sources.title: Forget Me Not | Full Movie | Romantic Drama
sources.description:
Forget Me Not - The Long Road Home depicts an escaped British POW's epic battle for survival whilst on the run in war-torn Italy, as his wife and young son anxiously await news in England. shot across five countries and over three years in production.
2010.  Stars: Luke de Woolfson, Charlie Covell, Susie Harriet

metadata.Plot: It's graduation weekend, and Sandy Channing, the popular class president of her small-town high school, should be enjoying the time of her life. But when her friends start disappearing, Sandy discovers they have unwittingly awakened the vengeful spirit of a girl they wronged long ago. Fighting for her sanity, Sandy must unlock a dark secret from her own past before it's too late.
metadata.Actors: Carly Schroeder, Cody Linley, Brie Gabrielle
